name: Orpheus - a Saga of Love and Pixel
name_original: Orpheus - a Saga of Love and Pixel
description:
Eurydike is lost in the Underworld. Her husband Orpheus is making a deal with Hades to save her. Can you help him?

This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2019. I had a lot of fun with it and its the first game I made, that sees something like "completion". I am excited to hear your feedback.

Controls:

WASD - movement

Space - call Eurydike to your position / continue dialogue

Known "features":

- flickering screen when loading new scene

- no running animation when using Controller/Joystick

- wibbleywobbley text issues when pressing Space too quickly during cut scene. It's fun, you should try it out!

Outlook, plans and dreams:

- more than one level

- boss"fight" against Hades

- less repetetetetetive soundtrack in the Level(s)
